comments.author: Swordsoffreedom
comments.body: In my opinion, war is much scarier than crime, crime can cause injury to you or danger to your family, but you can also prevent it in many different ways, and it is not too difficult to handle in the face of crime. But with war, when it happens not only you but all your loved ones are at risk of losing their lives at any time and you will not be able to resist or find a safe place if your country is at war. Both are scary things and we shouldn't expect to see or face them.
